column2:
"Welcome back!
Did you snatch them back from the
D-arkers?"

"Although the colour of these stones
were changed, at least the damages
were stopped so it's alright!"

"So the stones from the Ruins were
saved! We're so glad to have make a big
historical discovery!"

"Thank you once again!
We'll really glad that we can depend on
you!"

"おかえりなさいっ！
ダーカーから取り戻せたっ？"

"この玉石たちは変色しちゃったけど
被害は食い止めたし、大丈夫だよね！"

"これで遺跡の玉石は守られたよ！
歴史的大発見だと嬉しいねー！"

"いつもいつもありがとうーっ！
貴方に頼んでよかった！"
